name: To Kill A Man
description:
Fight the various organs inside the human body to reach the heart, and defeat the heart in order to land the kill...

Pick from a party of 4 common viruses and parasites including their classes to defeat the heart!

Late submission to the Weekly Game Jam 150 due to build errors..

Tools Used

Unity 2019.3
Photoshop CC
Maya

Credits

Jamie Briggs - Developer
Paulina Malowaniec - Artwork
Ren Spiers - 3D Modelling
